@Twokinds Thanks for the clarification. Of course, I understand that patron's count about 340 with $10-or-above rewards, even if only 50% of them have sketch requests, it is physically impossible to fit them into about 80 poll variants,
just it was a bit unclear for me rejection reason: either I was wrong somewhere, or it should be.

Maybe just worth adding a small explanation to the Google form like “if your sketch request was completed the last time, maybe this time it will not be in poll due to patron's count, who wants to send a request”.

It was flashy, but that was about it. Captain Marvel herself was utterly uninteresting.

Brie Larson is so lackluster in charm and charisma that the only way she lights up a room is by leaving it. The humor was forced, and the only interactions that felt halfway interesting were those where she was talking to Samuel Jackson, but that's more
